name: Abhishek Uniyal
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
bio: A highly technical, team-oriented professional with extensive experience in software development with demonstrated ability to work through a problem effectively and provide the best solutions.
description:
I'm a self-taught Software Engineer with a keen interest in User Experience. âš¡ I like to work on software products that people want and deep tech innovations. I give my 100% on products that resonate with me. Apart from building software, I like to do research & build communities with a purpose. I built @fnplus and organised workshops, hackathons and virtual events to get students build their technical skills by building projects. 
 I like to connect with people and hearing their perspectives. Talk to me about tech, startups, entrepreneurship, space, games, video games, food, travel and conspiracy theories.
